To All Mothers:

We say Happy Mother's Day. 

May our words guide our work.

To Mothers we lost, we miss, we will always love. You are gone but your love still lives, your spirit still gives. 

To Mothers weary from work, bone tired from trials, undervalued and under supported...

To Mothers who have lost their children, who through their pain, Demand Action so no more children are lost. 

To Mothers of community, on porches and street corners, who give wisdom and guidance and remind us that we belong.

To Mothers who protect & inspire; shelter & give us foundation to stand & reach higher & higher  

To Mothers who parent children not their own; who see no boundaries of biology, only limitless love & invincible grace.

To all mothers

To Mothers of biology, of spirit, of love.  

To Mothers who embrace all of us, our total being, despite ourselves. 

To Mothers who love us through our hurt, pain, through fear and frustration, through our stumbles and falls, through and through and through. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1657731583619522560/img/1UG8CpeRp79kQiMf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1657731583619522560/vid/320x568/X-fmVIb8tTO69kxg.mp4?tag=14
